CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISBLANK(text(BirthdateDay__c)),!ISBLANK(text(BirthdateYear__c))), text(BirthdateYear__c), IF(AND(!ISBLANK(text(BirthdateDay__c)),ISBLANK(text(BirthdateYear__c))), TEXT(BirthdateDay__c) +" / "+ SPO_MonthTECH__c , IF(AND(ISBLANK(text(BirthdateDay__c)),ISBLANK(text(BirthdateYear__c))), "", TEXT(BirthdateDay__c) +" / "+ SPO_MonthTECH__c +" / "+ text(BirthdateYear__c))))
CustomField.label: Birthdate
